metadata.title: CVE-2017-14098 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the pjsip channel driver (res_pjsip) in Asterisk 13.x before 13.17.1 and14.x before 14.6.1, a carefully crafted tel URI in a From, To, or Contactheader could cause Asterisk to crash.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
